name: Sokoban (cagox)
description:
Thank you for looking at my project. It is a 3D Sokoban implementation created in Unity. I  have files available for 64 Bit windows and Linux.

If you have suggestions or comments, let me know! I have included a readme file in each that includes an email address to contact me.

 If enough people take an interest, I may expand on the game. I already have a few ideas of how I can do so.
